text: Choi Sang-mok (Korean: 최상목, born 7 June 1963) is a South Korean politician. He was the acting president and acting prime minister of South Korea from 27 December 2024 to 24 March 2025. Choi was also the deputy prime minister and minister of Economy and Finance from December 2023 to May 2025. == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of South Korea Category:Presidents of South Korea
title: Choi Sang-mok
